title: Countries with the lowest infant mortality rate 2017
yAxis: Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births in the y axis.
The Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births is highest at Country Luxembourg and lowest at Country Monaco.
The highest Country Luxembourg has 1.6 more Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births than the lowest Country Monaco.
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births in each Country on the y axis.
The Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births is appeared to be the highest at Country Luxembourg and lowest at Country Monaco.

max_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births 3.4 is found at Country Luxembourg and the minimum is found at Monaco where Country is 1.8.
There is a difference of 1.6 between the maximum Country Luxembourg and minimum Country Monaco.
Country Luxembourg is higher than any other Countrys with value 3.4, followed by , and Germany. Down to Country Monaco with the lowest value 1.8.
Similar Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births is found in Country Luxembourg, Austria, Belgium, and Germany.
The lowest value 1.8 at Monaco is almost 1.2 times smaller than the average value 2.82.
The Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births is 56.5 if we add up values of all Countrys.
